permissions.permissionUserRequired: 您必須具有以下權限才能使用此命令：{{0}}.
permissions.permissionBotRequired: 您必須具有以下權限才能使用此指令：{{0}}.
permissions.title: 權限

onMention: <:chino_rawr:751215250245943318> **|** 你好，{{0}}。我的指令前綴是`{{1}}`。如果你想看看我能做什麼，請使用`{{1}}help`。
missingBotPermission: 我沒有 {{perm}} 權限。請檢查我的權限/身分組，然後重試。
missingUserPermission: 您沒有 {{perm}} 權限。您無法執行此指令。
missingBotPermissionOnChannel: 嘿{{0}} 我沒有對 {{2}} 的 {{1}} 權限。請檢查我的權限，然後重試。
invalidUser: 我找不到這個人。你確定這個用戶存在嗎？
invalidRole: 我找不到這個身分組。你確定這個伺服器裡有這個身分組嗎？
invalidEmoji: 我找不到這個表情符號。你確定這個表情符號來自這個伺服器嗎？

punishment.bigReason: 你必須寫一個簡短的理由，這個理由對我來說攏長了。
punishment.selfPunishment: 抱歉，但是，由於您無法在正常的 Discord 上懲罰自己，因此您無法通過我來懲罰自己。
punishment.ownerPunish: 你瘋了嗎？你不能懲罰這個人，他們是這個伺服器的主人。
punishment.error: 我不能懲罰這個成員。也許他們的身分組比我高。檢查身分組並重試。

missingArgs: 無效的論據！使用 `{{prefix}}{{commandName}}` 查看正確的用法。

addedToGuild.thanks: 感謝你邀請我加入你們的伺服器!
addedToGuild.description:
哇{{0}}！感謝您將我加入`{{1}}`，讓我自我介紹一下。

我是一個小機器人，有很多有用的功能，比如... **moderation**、**fun** 和 **utilities**。預設情況下，我的指令前綴是`{{2}}`

如果您需要幫助，請使用 `{{2}}help` 或 `{{2}}invite` 加入我的幫助伺服器。祝你玩得開心，待會見。
addedToGuild.guildSaved: 已成功將伺服器 {{0}} 保存在數據庫中！

voice.authorAreNotInVoiceChannel: 你必須在語音頻道上，但你不是。
voice.playerAlreadyPlaying: 我的收音機已經在播放了。
voice.clientAreNotInVoiceChannel: 我現在不在語音頻道中，請使用`/animu play`。
voice.playerNotFound: 我現在沒有玩任何東西，使用`/animu play`。
voice.maxVolume: hey, calm down! The maximum volume allowed is `100`.
voice.minVolume: hey, calm down! The minimal volume allowed is `5`.

guildban.title: Guild Banned
guildban.explain: `{{0}}` is banned, according to the reason below. Do you think the ban was unfair? Join my [support server](https://discord.gg/Jr57UrsXeC) and maybe get them unbanned.

cooldown: please, wait more {{0}} seconds to execute this command again!
disabledCommand:
sorry, but, this command has some problems and it is disabled for a while
**Reason:** `{{0}}`
blockedChannel: you can't use commands here, go to {{0}} and try again.

migrate.migrateToSlashCommand: Hey! After January 2022 I'll only answer to slash commands, please, if you want to continue using me, then you must re-add me, you can do that by clicking [here](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id={{0}}&permissions=1378654604670&scope=bot%20applications.commands&guild_id={{1}}), you don't need to kick me out of the server. Thank you! If you want stop receive this message, type `{{2}}stopnotify`. <a:chino_petpet:760564885280784405>
migrate.disabledToSlashCommands: It's time to say goodbye to normal commands, now it's only available slash commands. Right now, this command is deprecated, but you can use me normally using slash commands, type `/help` to see my command list.
migrate.howToUseSlash:
1.) For old users who don't re-invited me to this server, you can re-invite me by clicking [here](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id={{0}}&permissions=1378654604670&scope=bot%20applications.commands&guild_id={{1}}), it's important you make sure that you've already re-invited me.
2.) The user need to have `Use Application Commands`'s permission to use my commands.
3.) If you are unable to see the slash commands, make sure you enabled `User Settings -> Text and Images -> Use slash commands and preview emojis, mentions, and markdown syntax as you type`
migrate.needSupportTitle: Still confused how to use the bot?
migrate.needSupportSlash: If you still confused how to using me properly, feel free to join our [support server](https://discord.gg/Jr57UrsXeC) to get help from our support team.
